message: I have a unique opportunity for you, Bob. I'm willing to sell this valuable product to you for $12,000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity, but $12,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. How about $9,000? I believe this is a fair price for both of us, considering your value and my budget.

I understand that $9,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit. How about $11,000? I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,000. This is a fair price that allows you to make a profit while staying within my budget.

I understand that $10,000 is a good offer, but I'm not ready to meet you at that price just yet. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $10,500? I think it's a fair price that balances our interests.
Alice, I truly appreciate your efforts to find a solution. I'm willing to go up to $10,250. I believe this is a fair compromise that allows us both to get what we want.  Let's close this deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10,250. I'll make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about $11,000? I think it's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you.
